OOC: Sorry aboyt the 100 shot thing. I was in a rush this morning and I
just typed a number of the top of my head.

::DrillBit::

He was about to shoot optics at the bull and jump, but the EMP sent the
bull back.
"Will someone please explain what is going on?!"
